message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
